channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15579] Support HADOOP_PROXY_USER for secure impersonation in hive metastore client
item.description: Hadoop clients support HADOOP_PROXY_USER for secure impersonation. It would be useful to have similar feature for hive metastore client.
item.summary: Support HADOOP_PROXY_USER for secure impersonation in hive metastore client

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
As suggested by libing in HIVE-13384, the HIVE-15579.000.patch creates Delegation Token with real user and uses the same to connect using proxy user.

Please review the patch.

Thanks for the patch nandakumar131
Replace the comment " //hack to support HADOOP_PROXY_USER" with "// If HADOOP_PROXY_USER is set in env or property, then need to create metastore client that proxies as that user"

If an exception is thrown during that process, we should thrown an exception and not continue further.
ie - throw new MetaException("Error while setting delegation token for " + proxyUser, e);

thejas, thanks for the review.
Incorporated the review comments in HIVE-15579.001.patch.

MetaException doesn't support (String, Exception), so added the following logic

catch (Exception e) {
        LOG.error("Error while setting delegation token for " + proxyUser + " user.");
        if(e instanceof MetaException) {
          throw (MetaException)e;
        } else {
          throw new MetaException(e.getMessage());
        }

Please review.

Can you retain the exception in log message like previous patch ?
ie use - LOG.error("Error while setting delegation token for " + proxyUser, e);

Thanks for the review thejas.
As per the comment, retained the exception in the log message in HIVE-15579.002.patch

Just a small nit - add " user" to this error message is redundant.
ie, can you please replace -
LOG.error("Error while setting delegation token for " + proxyUser + " user.", e);
with
LOG.error("Error while setting delegation token for " + proxyUser, e);

Patch committed to master.
Thanks for your contribution nandakumar131!

Forgot to add jira number in commit message, made entry in errata.txt for that
Does this need to be documented in the wiki?

Yes, we should document it.

nandakumar131 Can you please summarize the user facing change in release notes section of jira ? We should then incorporate it in wiki as well.

Not able to edit the jira to add release note. (guess I don't have permission)

Content to be added as part of release note:

Using HADOOP_PROXY_USER a superuser can access hive through hive cli on behalf of another user.
To use this feature, export HADOOP_PROXY_USER with the user that has to be proxied and start hive cli.

The HADOOP_PROXY_USER variable can be set as part of system environmental variable or in system properties.
nandakumar131, I put your content in the Release Note field.
Thanks leftylev for adding the Release Note, and thank you thejas for the review and commit.

hi nanda thejas 

Why is RealUser called? In most cases, the LoginUser's RealUser is null.

https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/bf69b32c878c0d53f242cc38b6634c8ee4346e76/standalone-metastore/metastore-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/HiveMetaStoreClient.java#L243

 

UserGroupInformation ugi = UserGroupInformation.createProxyUser(proxyUserA, realUserB )

i think proxyUserA is `UserGroupInformation.getCurrentUser()` and  realUserB is `UserGroupInformation.getCurrentUser().getRealUser()`

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
Using HADOOP_PROXY_USER a superuser can access hive through hive cli on behalf of another user.
To use this feature, export HADOOP_PROXY_USER with the user that has to be proxied and start hive cli.
The HADOOP_PROXY_USER variable can be set as part of system environmental variable or in system properties.
